Detailed Description

Adds scrolling feature to QTabBar.

It has a horizontal layout containing: m_leftScrollButton | m_scrollArea | m_rightScrollButton

m_scrollArea is a QScrollArea with a TabBarHelper as its widget, and it uses a TabScrollBar as its horizontal scrollbar
